docs.lead_paragraph: THE FIRE DEPARTMENT.--Some weeks since a convention, consisting of delegates from the different companies composing the Fire Department, was held at Fire man's Hall, for the purpose of nominating two candidates for the office of Chief Engineer of the Department, to be voted for on the 14th December, which resulted in the nomination of JOHN C. ROACH and JOHN J. GREEN.

headline.main: GOSSIP ABOUT CHILDREN.; A Familiar Epistle. From "Knick-Knacks from an Editor's Table."

docs.lead_paragraph: MY DEAR FRIEND: I love children, I used to think when I was a bachelor, (it is a good many years ago now,) that there was something rather presuming in the manner in which doating fathers and mothers would bring their "wee things" around them, and, for the especial edification of us single fellows, cause them to " mis-speak half-uttered words," and to go through with divers little lessons in manners and elocution.

docs.lead_paragraph: Three Steamships and nearly Three Millions of Dollars in gold dust, reached the City yesterday. The event is the more remarkable, because the prognostics from the Mines have not latterly been so encouraging.
docs.snippet: Three Steamships and nearly Three Millions of Dollars in gold dust, reached the City yesterday. The event is the more remarkable, because the prognostics from the Mines have not latterly been so encouraging.

docs.lead_paragraph: We cannot call Mdme. SONTAG'S beautiful entertainment of Saturday morning a mere rehearsal, though as such it was given out. It was one of the most pleasing concerts, taken as a whole, we have attended during the present season.
docs.snippet: We cannot call Mdme. SONTAG'S beautiful entertainment of Saturday morning a mere rehearsal, though as such it was given out. It was one of the most pleasing concerts, taken as a whole, we have attended during the present season.

headline.main: ELEVEN DAY SLATER FROM CALIFORNIA.; ARRIVAL OF THREE STEAMERS. NEARLY THREE MILLIONS IN GOLD DUST. THE COUNTRY QUIET. FROM OREGON AND THE SANDWICH ISLANDS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamers Prometheus, Northern Light and Georgia arrived at this port on Saturday after noon and yesterday, bringing dates from California to the 10th November, and later advices from San Juan, Aspinwall, and Kingston, Jam.
docs.snippet: The steamers Prometheus, Northern Light and Georgia arrived at this port on Saturday after noon and yesterday, bringing dates from California to the 10th November, and later advices from San Juan, Aspinwall, and Kingston, Jam.
